website_summaries.verdict: A versatile shoe polishing kit by KIWI, a top name in shoe care. An excellent kit that's perfect for protecting and beautifying your leather shoes.
pros: Offers a wide range of products for numerous shoe polishing needs, including brushes, daubers, and cloths
Comes with black and brown polish
We love the handsome shoe valet box with pedal that gives this kit a professional touch
cons: The latch on the box needs improving, as it's flimsy and prone to breakage
Kit is on the higher end of the price range

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight box. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: The box is nothing at all like the one my Dad had. The wood is very lightweight and flimsy. We used my Dad’s to stand on while we brushed our teeth or washed our hair. This one is not sturdy enough for that. I ended up getting a nice custom made box and giving this one away. If you are a wood worker, you will hate this cheaply made box. Don’t let the dovetails fool you. When I received the package, I thought it might be empty. That’s how lightweight it is. The brushes are also very small. It’s a shame how quality has gone down so much.
customer_reviews.author: Marty55

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous Quality
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the beautiful wood case. It’s a work of art that makes it so convenient to polish our shoes. My wife will be very happy seeing how my shoes are normally shiny now that I have one of these on our shoe rack going forward bro our house from the garage and at my office at work. Making it easy and handy is the key for me. This kit was the perfect answer.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Quality Issues w/ Box.
customer_reviews.text: Looks like the box suffered some manufacturing or shipping damage. Looks like the box was accidentally smashed on a small portion of the bottom front half. I noticed that the top lid doesn't align very well with bottom piece either. Appears that this issue is due to poor quality hinges and screws on the box. I was reimbursed for my purchase by Amazon, which is awesome customer service. I'm a little skeptical if I want to use Kiwi's brand for wax and polish given some of the quality issues on the box. I'll try out the product on my cheaper shoes to see if its works well first.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Branski

customer_reviews.title: Quite good brushes, and I have trusted Kiwi with my ...
customer_reviews.text: About what u would expect. Quite good brushes, and I have trusted Kiwi with my dress shoes since I was young. Polish applicators r cheap and pad will fall off the plastic handle soon. Lid hinges r cheap as well.
customer_reviews.author: Faith and David

customer_reviews.title: Small but well worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It's smaller than I expected it to be.. It's kind of the toy version of a shoe shine box.. But other than the small size it is good quality and well worth the money. Let's face it, you have a closet full of shoes and boots so why not buy this and use it so you don't have to worry about stepping in that puddle and spending the day with a wet foot. Or put your kid to work outside the mall or Walmart. Lol good product, fast shipping, worth the money.. Buy it even if you only use it as a display piece.
customer_reviews.author: Rick L Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Small but great
customer_reviews.text: Great ahow box to keep everything you need for your shoes organize
customer_reviews.author: Alx

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new box for my shoeshine supplies, this was what I needed. It came with the supplies inside to get you started to have great looking shoes and boots. I guess I’m a shoeshine freak since I had to keep my boots shined up at the Fire Station. Comes with Black and Brown polish.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Reigel

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as a gift; recipient very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item knowing the recipient wanted a shoeshine kit, not any specific brand. It was within my budget and I was familiar with the Kiwi name. So far the valet/kit has been a big hit and has seen a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Macdiarmid

customer_reviews.title: I’m all set!
customer_reviews.text: Good product to get you started with your home shining of shoes. If you have a variety of colors you will need to supplement this package with a few other items, but overall good value for what you pay.
customer_reviews.author: B. Peden

customer_reviews.title: Cheap hardware
customer_reviews.text: Carpentry is decent but the hardware is absolute garbage. The spring for the latch hasp pulls the little tabs out that hold it in place after latching it 3 times. Have already ordered heavier duty replacement latch and hinges. Sadly, that’s what you get when everything is outsourced to China. The labor isn’t the only thing cheap. Certainly not the quality of the same 25 year old valet I bought when when I was in the military that got beat up for years.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P

customer_reviews.title: Makes a really nice gift!
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift for my granddaughter who is starting the police academy. Of course, having regulation shined shoes is a must. I think this will work great! And it is nice looking too! There was another one that had a brush applicator that cost just a little bit more, but I had bought the brush, so this is adequate.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Vodak

customer_reviews.title: Love this kit!
customer_reviews.text: This kit is perfect because it has two of everything for both standard shoe colors: black and brown! I throw all my other shoe care items in the box also and frequently shine my shoes for length of like and looks of course. Glad to have two brushes and sponges, one for each color! Don't need to mix and match anything with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my partner, who's a bit of a stickler with leather care. They loved it! I ended up getting them a set of brushes to complement it, but this was just what they wanted! The box is lovely and sturdy, with plenty of space to store a modest leather care collection. Great gift!
customer_reviews.author: Auna

customer_reviews.title: Great construction
customer_reviews.text: Great kit. Box joints are all dove tail. Nice tight fit and good looking. All my supplies to keep my duty boots in one place. No more nagging wife about my polish supplies
customer_reviews.author: Dave Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: Super! Is what it says in ad.
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for in a shoe shine kit! Bought a larger buffer cloth because of my prefrence. In stores these do not exist. So happy to find a quality item.
customer_reviews.author: Carson57

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe shining box
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. The box is very well made and the products are according to the price paid. I use it for all my shoes and now my wife wants me to polish her boots as well.
customer_reviews.author: The Joe

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful box but cheep latch
customer_reviews.text: Wood construction looks good but the latch broke within the first couple days of use. Apparently the lid was not closed properly and my husband put his foot on it and the latch broke. Now it can not be picked up they way it was made to be picked up. Still works fine and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne J Bowen

customer_reviews.title: Broken, quality control missed this one
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this because of the great reviews. Unfortunately, mine came completely broken - front latch hanging on by one screw and rear hinge loose (looks like the screws split the wood). See pictures. Other than that it seems like a nice kit.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality box and kit
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted a shoe shine kit for a long time. IT comes with several cans of polish and sponge applicators. I decided to use the bag included for the black polish, brush, applicator and cloth. Then got another gallon size for the brown stuff. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday present, he loves it. Nobody makes the wooden boxes anymore.

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift and he loved it. He moved all of his old supplies ...

It came perfectly packaged for a gift and made the presentation great. A great gift for a stylish man who is hard to shop for! The pic was taken seconds before he started. I wasnt able to get a pic of the shined shoe but everything looked great and it made his shoes look new again. He loves it and said it’s a good quality.

customer_reviews.title: ... a gift for my father in law and he LOVED it! The box is really good quality and ...

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice shoe polish kit

customer_reviews.title: 17 yr old grandson loves it.

product_meta.title: Kiwi Select Shoe Care Valet
product_meta.description:
This ten piece set features a first-class wooden valet box with foot pedal. Includes two tins of Kiwi Select premium paste polish in black and brown, two 100% horsehair brushes, two soft shine cloths, two shoe daubers and one shoe horn. The complete shoe care shine kit for the perfect professional finish.




PRODUCT DETAILS
 * Is Discontinued By Manufacturer :No
 * Package Dimensions :11.5 x 8.5 x 8 inches; 4.1 Pounds
 * Department :Mens
 * Date First Available :October 25, 2011
 * Manufacturer :SC Johnson & Sons Inc
 * ASIN :B001M6661S

 * Amazon Best Sellers Rank: #64,837 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry (See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry)  *  #79 inShoe Care Kits & Sets 
   
   

 * Customer Reviews:4.6 out of 5 stars495 ratings This ten piece set features a first-class wooden valet box with foot pedal. Includes two tins of Kiwi Select premium paste polish in black and brown, two 100% horsehair brushes, two soft shine cloths, two shoe daubers and one shoe horn. The complete shoe care shine kit for the perfect professional finish.
feature_bullets: 2 Soft Shine Cloths (17 inch x 3-3/4 inch)
